solution_line_template: Each person brought {bags_per_person} bags * {max_weight_per_bag} pounds per bag = <<{bags_per_person}*{max_weight_per_bag}={weight_per_person}>>{weight_per_person} pounds per person.
There are {num_people} people * {weight_per_person} pounds per person = <<{num_people}*{weight_per_person}={total_luggage_weight}>>{total_luggage_weight} pounds of luggage on the plane.
The plan can hold {plane_capacity} pounds - {total_luggage_weight} pounds = <<{plane_capacity}-{total_luggage_weight}={remaining_capacity}>>{remaining_capacity} pounds of luggage space left.

The plane can hold an additional {remaining_capacity} pounds / {max_weight_per_bag} pounds per bag = <<{remaining_capacity}/{max_weight_per_bag}={additional_bags}>>{additional_bags} pieces of luggage.
